title: Fundamentals of Simulation-based Education in Health Professions Education
description:
This module will expose participants to the fundamentals of simulation-based education (SBE) in healthcare. The module will explore the educational theories applied to SBE, scenario design, creating safe learning environments, and facilitating immersive simulation, touching on feedback and debriefing. 
Participants will have to opportunity to design, develop and implement a simulation-based educational activity specific to their healthcare setting.
prerequisite: Principles of Learning and Teaching in the Professions and Principles and Applications of TEL or Completion of other relevant modules in the past 5 years can be considered on a case by case basis
